title: $TRX: Tron Foundation Challenges SEC Lawsuit Over Jurisdiction and Token Classification
description: On March 28, Tron Foundation urged a New York federal court to drop a lawsuit initiated by the U.S. SEC, arguing that the SEC is overreaching by targeting actions that primarily occurred outside the U.S. The foundation’s dismissal motion highlights its stance against the SEC’s global jurisdiction claims over its digital asset offerings. title: 44-Day Bitcoin Drain: Coinbase and Binance Shed 76,179 BTC in Less Than 2 Months
description: Recent figures show that over a span of 44 consecutive days, 76,179 bitcoins, worth $5.41 billion, have been moved out of Coinbase and Binance, the two leading cryptocurrency exchange and custodial firms by reserve size and total trade volume. title: Navigating Cyber Risks in the Age of AI: Strategies for Organizations
description: The introduction of artificial intelligence (AI) into several industries has ushered in a new era of efficiency and innovation in today’s quickly changing technological landscape. title: Cardano Must Increase Number of Transactions to Improve Sustainability – Stakeholder
description:
Patrick Tobler, CEO of NMKR, believes there needs to be an increase in the number of transactions on Cardano to keep the chain sustainable. In a recent post on X, Tobler noted it would be detrimental for Cardano if running stake pools became unprofitable. In his opinion, replacing staking rewards coming from the treasury through […]
